mutants.code:
def maxVowels(s: str, k: int) -> int:
    vowels = set('aeiou')
    cnt = sum((1 for c in s[:k] if c in vowels))
    max_cnt = cnt
    for i in range(k, len(s)):
        cnt += s[i - k] in vowels
        cnt += s[i] in vowels
        max_cnt = max(max_cnt, cnt)
    return max_cnt

    for i in range(k, len(s)):
        cnt -= s[i - k] in vowels
        cnt -= s[i] in vowels
        max_cnt = max(max_cnt, cnt)
    return max_cnt

def maxVowels(s: str, k: int) -> int:
    vowels = set('aeiou')
    cnt = sum((1 for c in s[:k] if c not in vowels))
    max_cnt = cnt
    for i in range(k, len(s)):
        cnt -= s[i - k] in vowels
        cnt += s[i] in vowels
        max_cnt = max(max_cnt, cnt)
    return max_cnt

def maxVowels(s: str, k: int) -> int:
    vowels = set('aeiou')
    cnt = sum((1 for c in s[:k] if c in vowels))
    max_cnt = cnt
    for i in range(k, len(s)):
        cnt -= s[i + k] in vowels
        cnt += s[i] in vowels
        max_cnt = max(max_cnt, cnt)
    return max_cnt

def maxVowels(s: str, k: int) -> int:
    vowels = set('aeiou')
    cnt = sum((1 for c in s[:k] if c in vowels))
    max_cnt = cnt
    for i in range(k, len(s)):
        cnt -= s[i * k] in vowels
        cnt += s[i] in vowels
        max_cnt = max(max_cnt, cnt)
    return max_cnt
